title: Get Account Types (request)
description: Types of accounts available to create or link to.

company.description: [Optional] Set to landing company to get relevant account types. If not set, this defaults to current account landing company

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field. Maximum size is 3500 bytes.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
